page.title: 06Education in the area
page.content: { }North Bradley school is over one hundred years The old school is a Victorian building.This has the infant classrooms in.There is a new building with two classrooms in.One of these classrooms we use as a hall.The new hall is supposed to be built in the next five years.We have three mobiles in the school grounds. There used to be six class rooms in the school now there is only{five class rooms and one libarary, There is about one hundred and fifty pupils. { The head masters main house is now used as a staff room and a head's office for Mr Ward. Up stairs there is a music room and a storage room for paper, pen, paint and other things. In the grounds of the school we have a football pitch, a 'wild area' and gardens.
